rule: The paragraph must conclude with an expression of the feeling or emotion that the image should evoke.
input: Riders in a horse show under golden afternoon light against a grassy arena backdrop, evoking excitement and freedom.
coverage: Prompt: A group of riders skillfully guiding their horses, clad in elegant riding attire, perform in a horse show. The golden hues of the late afternoon sunlight cast a warm glow over the scene. In the background, an expansive and lush grassy arena adds a sense of openness and vibrancy. This setting exudes an atmosphere of excitement and the exhilarating spirit of freedom, drawing viewers into the world of equestrian grace and dynamic motion.
